Welcome to Stock Monitor! 


To find interesting companies to follow, click on the magnifying glass to use the search function.


If you want to add a stock to your selected list, click on the stock and then on the + next to the graph.


To remove a stock from your selected list, click on the stock and then on the - next to the graph.


To find stock related news that will help you decide what stocks to follow, please visit the 'News' page.


Enjoy!
